dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: Forename, ever a sight for sore eyes! What brings you here this day? Are you come to see our progress, or perhaps to contribute to it?

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: In any case, I owe you a debt of gratitude. Thanks to able and willing helpers such as your good self, the reconstruction effort proceeds apace. This court has fairly been reborn, I believe you will agree.

dialogue.name: AUGEBERT
dialogue.text: Oi, Francel. I've finished my checks, and everything looks to be order. That's that for the court, I reckon.

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: Glad am I to hear it. This is a momentous step in our projectâ”€one we could not have taken without the aid of Ishgardians and outsiders alike.

dialogue.name: AUGEBERT
dialogue.text: Aye. At last, we've got a flow of materials comin' in, along with the hands to put it all to use. It begins in earnest.

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: That it does, my friend. That it does.

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: Forename, Augebert. There is something I would ask of you.

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: I bid you commit to your mind's eye the Firmament as it is now.

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: When the last paving stone is laid, I would have you fully appreciate how much has been accomplished by the sweat of innumerable brows.

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: For though Ishgard may arrive at a brighter future, we must never forget the path we walked to get there, fraught with sorrow and sacrifice as it was.

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: If we do so, I fear we will lose our way again.

dialogue.name: AUGEBERT
dialogue.text: Heh, same old Francel, though, eh? Try to unclench that jaw of yours a little, lad, else you're liable to give yourself a fever and collapse like you used to.

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: Those days are long past, thank you very much!

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: <sigh> Just...remember what I asked. And pray keep it private. 'Tis a personal request to the two of you.

dialogue.name: AUGEBERT
dialogue.text: Don't worry, you know I ain't no gossipmonger. Now then, if there's nothing else, I'll get back to it.

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: All right, my friend. Take care you do not overwork yourself, and tell the others the same.

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: Well, there you have it, Forename. There will be a brief hiatus while we prepare for the next phase of construction. When all is in readiness, I shall make another announcement.

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: In the meantime, do rest and recover your strength. 'Twas good to see you again.
